description: Proposed profile of ZIP (based on APPNOTE.TXT Version 6.3.3) for use as an ISO standard.  Will be ISO/IEC 21320-1 once approved.

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name:
ISO/IEC 21320-1
[as of January 2014, in committee draft stage] Information technology -- Document Container File -- Part 1: Core
(formal name).  Profile of ZIP File Format, Version 6.3.3 from PKWARE.
